last_episode_to_air.name: …Brave As a Lion
last_episode_to_air.overview: With the curse closing in, the girls must make a tough decision, and one faces a hard truth that could change everything.

name: Light as a Feather
overview: Five teen girls deal with the supernatural fallout stemming from an innocent game of “Light as a Feather, Stiff as a Board.” When the girls start dying off in the exact way that was predicted, the survivors must figure out why they’re being targeted — and whether the evil force hunting them down is one of their own.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: In Season 2, having inherited the curse brought on by the lethal game, McKenna finds herself plagued by the mysterious chrysalis on her back, a ticking clock compelling her to play a new round of the game… But McKenna refuses, unwilling to put anyone else in harm’s way. However, as the curse begins to destroy her from the inside out, she’s forced to turn to the only person who can possibly help her.

episodes.name: …Stiff as a Board
episodes.overview: Four best friends invite the shy new girl out on Halloween, but they soon regret their decision when she suggests they play a twisted version of Light as a Feather, Stiff as a Board.

episodes.name: ...Pretty as a Picture
episodes.overview: It’s Olivia’s 18th birthday party and McKenna is going with her longtime crush, Henry. But a shocking discovery gives the night an unexpected turn.

episodes.name: ...Dead as a Doornail
episodes.overview: The girls start to suspect Violet may not be as innocent as she claims.

episodes.name: …Dark as the Night
episodes.overview: As McKenna investigates Violet, she finds herself haunted by nightmares of her past.

episodes.name: …Mad as a Hatter
episodes.overview: Violet uncovers crucial information about the girls’ relationship.

episodes.name: …Troubled as the Tide
episodes.overview: Violet continues her manipulation. Trey is helped by an unlikely ally.

episodes.name: …Right as Rain
episodes.overview: A dangerous secret about Violet is revealed.

episodes.name: …Cold as Ice
episodes.overview: Determined to get answers, McKenna devises a new plan.

episodes.name: …Innocent as a Lamb
episodes.overview: Violet recounts an important story from her past.

episodes.name: ...Slippery as an Eel
episodes.overview: McKenna has an unconventional proposal.

episodes.name: …Lost As Eden
episodes.overview: As McKenna’s life starts to spiral, she finds herself turning to an unlikely ally. The girls head to a party where Alex meets a mysterious woman.

episodes.name: …Free As A Bird
episodes.overview: McKenna and Alex start their court-ordered community service. Violet gives McKenna advice.

episodes.name: …Sly As A Fox
episodes.overview: McKenna figures out a way to track her sleepwalking. Trey reconnects with an old friend.

episodes.name: ...Sick as a Dog
episodes.overview: A horrible accident leads McKenna to believe the Light As A Feather game has been played again. Trey performs with Sammi’s band.

episodes.name: ...Silent as the Night
episodes.overview: McKenna has an unfortunate run-in. Violet and Alex try to find out more about the Light As A Feather game.

episodes.name: ...Pale as Death
episodes.overview: The girls make a discovery that could lead them to the origins of the game. Isaac and Violet get closer.

episodes.name: ...Guilty as Sin
episodes.overview: A secret from Violet's past comes back to haunt her. McKenna and Sammi go on a trip.

episodes.name: ...White as a Ghost
episodes.overview: The girls have a new lead that could fix all their problems -- but to see it through, they will have to risk it all.

episodes.name: ...Fresh As a Daisy
episodes.overview: It’s New Year’s Eve as the girls anxiously celebrate their return to normal. Trey and Sammi’s band, Bit of Decay, play their biggest show yet.

episodes.name: ...Trapped As a Rat
episodes.overview: Violet encounters an old friend in the most unlikely of places. McKenna tries to find answers, only to find more trouble.

episodes.name: ...Clear As Mud
episodes.overview: The girls come up with a new plan that soon causes friction. Trey and Sammi prepare for a huge life change.

episodes.name: ...Hungry Like a Wolf
episodes.overview: Alex and Peri’s cabin escape takes an unpleasant turn. The rest of the gang struggle to help a friend.

episodes.name: ...Thick As Thieves
episodes.overview: As the friends turn to an unlikely source for help, one is forced to confront her greatest fear.

episodes.name: …Mean As a Rattlesnake
episodes.overview: As the stakes escalate, the girls find themselves scrambling to piece together clues.

episodes.name: ...Quiet As a Tomb
episodes.overview: McKenna pressures a friend to deliver on a deadly promise.

episodes.name: …Brave As a Lion
episodes.overview: With the curse closing in, the girls must make a tough decision, and one faces a hard truth that could change everything.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: In Season 2, having inherited the curse brought on by the lethal game, McKenna finds herself plagued by the mysterious chrysalis on her back, a ticking clock compelling her to play a new round of the game… But McKenna refuses, unwilling to put anyone else in harm’s way. However, as the curse begins to destroy her from the inside out, she’s forced to turn to the only person who can possibly help her.
